objectives: Students will discuss technology in daily life using Informal/Conversational register language
Students will engage with Comedy themed scenarios related to technology in daily life
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of informal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining technology in daily life content with Comedy narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore technology in daily life through a Comedy lens using Informal/Conversational language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a humorous misunderstanding or funny situation involving technology in daily life

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice informal register vocabulary related to technology in daily life in a comedy context
Students engage in comedy themed role-play about technology in daily life using informal register
Students create original comedy themed content about technology in daily life in informal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe technology in daily life in a Comedy scenario?
What hilarious or amusing might be involved in technology in daily life?
Can you create a Comedy story about technology in daily life?
How does technology in daily life change when viewed through a Comedy perspective?
What informal register expressions would you use to discuss this comedy scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Comedy situation involving technology in daily life
roles: Character A: Using informal register in comedy context
Character B: Responding in informal register within comedy theme

topic_genre_blend: technology in daily life with hilarious
technology in daily life with amusing
technology in daily life with ridiculous

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Informal/Conversational throughout: Friendly, relaxed everyday speech
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Comedy theme: Humor, wit, funny situations

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Informal/Conversational register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Comedy themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of informal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
